## QName.toPrefixString() function

Creates a prefix string of a QName

A prefix string consists of the prefix and the local name of the QName

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function toPrefixString(qname: QName): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  qname | QName | The QName to convert to a string |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
